holidays.description: Spark curiosity and discover a whole new exciting world on Introduce a Girl to Engineering Day.

holidays.description: It's Lailatul Barat, it's time to forgive and be forgiven. Learn more about it right here!

holidays.description: Wondering what this festival is and how you can commemorate it? Read on...

holidays.description: He has won the hearts of millions with his spectacular performances and rapping.
